data.text: @EdLGordon @kanyewest He knows exactly what he is doing.  It will backfire because his heart is not in the right place. He will Understand how wrong he is when his son is harassed by unethical white police officers and man handled for no reason before they find out he’s a Kardashian’s child.
@EdLGordon @kanyewest When is it time to throw the whole Kanye away?

@RonnieOdom @EdLGordon @kanyewest Arrogance. Shame when wealthy people forget the world doesn't work the same for us as the world works for him. His arrogance will turn to dust when he has a teachable moment: getting stopped by the police without his entourage. Spend more time uplifting & not tearing people down
@EdLGordon @kanyewest Plz Ed talk to Kanye , educate him on black history, slavery and definitions!

@EdLGordon @kanyewest The best thing anyone can do for Kanye is 1st get him back on his meds, then get him a God therapist and possibly a mental hospital that treats severe cases of narcissism....he is lost and he refuses to listen 2 anyone...talking 2 him wont help...
@EdLGordon @kanyewest Kanye is a CRAZY AZZ NUT https://t.co/2S0zsoeHqR
@EdLGordon @kanyewest Don't feel obligated to entertain self- indulgent narcissistic bs https://t.co/daGjq2vpm6

@EdLGordon @kanyewest Can we all stop mentioning his foolishness. He believes we want him to dislike @realDonaldTrump because most people with sense do. When we want him to be more informed about what and who he’s supporting. We also want him to know the facts before speaking.

@EdLGordon @kanyewest A lot of animus is against POTUS. Antagonist refuse to admit what his supporters laud him for: The Economy. And icing on the cake, right wing policies/judges etc. But despite some [window dressing] things stay the same or worse for B-people.
@EdLGordon @kanyewest I think he’s to far gone!

@EdLGordon @kanyewest For the past 60+yrs despite Dem or Rep., leadership there has been a permanent majority black underclass. Our communities hv more churches than businesses own by our people. Class warfare is blatant/seething.

@EdLGordon @kanyewest To accomplish that creates Civil War across Africa; divisions among civil rights leaders; divisions among women/men; doubts should clergy continue to lead our Political struggle for rights; class divisions on who's representing whom.  So, give KW his #Lane

@EdLGordon @kanyewest I get a sense that "confusion" is pervasive in Black folk across the globe as it pertains to complete liberation and manifesting a Will of Independence that guides us to prosperity, unity, and a creating a world of our makings.
@EdLGordon @kanyewest I wish you could help him, but your efforts might end up falling on dumb, not deaf ears just like what happened when you tried to straighten out @OMAROSA .
